xwikidoc.content: help.applications.blog.description=Blog Application allows you to publish your information and share it to the world. help.applications.blog.title=Blog help.applications.browseApplications.description=Choose from community contributed applications and install them inside your wiki. help.applications.browseApplications.tip={0}Extension Manager{1} helps you manage (install, update, uninstall) your applications. help.applications.browseApplications.title=Browse applications help.applications.createYourApplication.description=Define the structure of your data, customize it and create the application you want. help.applications.createYourApplication.tip={0}App Within Minutes{1} helps you build applications without having technical knowledge. help.applications.createYourApplication.title=Create your application help.applications.createYourApplication.demo.label=Demo help.applications.description=Applications allow to group related structured pages together. help.applications.examples.description=Need help or confused with some of our applications? Check out their documentation and find out more about their functionality. help.applications.examples.title=Examples help.applications.fileManager.description=File Manager manages your files, providing a viewer of supported files, tag cloud and allowing filtering. help.applications.fileManager.title=File Manager help.applications.forum.description=Forum Application allows you to create new categories and discuss topics within them. help.applications.forum.title=Forum help.applications.ideas.decription=Ideas Application encourage you to submit ideas that can be voted by your team. help.applications.ideas.title=Ideas help.applications.meetings.description=Meetings Application manages your meetings mentioning the date, location, participants, etc. help.applications.meetings.title=Meetings help.applications.menu.description=Menu Application helps you create navigation menus and displayed them in your instance. help.applications.menu.title=Menu help.applications.movie.title=Movies help.applications.title=Applications help.applications.viewMoreApplications=View more applications help.browse.label=Browse help.contentOrganization.description=Organize your content in hierarchical pages, grouped in several (sub)wikis. help.contentOrganization.title=Content Organization help.gettingStarted.description=Easy steps to get you started with XWiki. help.gettingStarted.title=Getting Started help.howToUseXwiki.description=XWiki offers a wide range of powerful features that will enable you to create, organize and find content. This section will show you how to use the basic features of XWiki. help.history.checkTheHistoryTab=Check the {0}history{0} tab. help.history.compareTheVersions=Compare the versions. help.history.title=History help.howToUseXwiki.title=How to use XWiki? help.importExport.description=Import conteknt from various sources and export it in an open format (XML, HTML, PDF, ODT). help.importExport.title=Import / Export help.learnMore.label=Learn more help.macros.barChart=Bar Chart help.macros.box.description=Displays a message in a styled box. help.macros.box.title=Box help.macros.boxMacro.title=Box Macros help.macros.boxMacros.description={0}Box Macro{1} displays a message in a styled box. help.macros.browseMacros.description=Choose from community contributed macros and install them inside your wiki. help.macros.browseMacros.tip=The {0}Macro Index{1} lists the macros that are already installed and ready to be used inside your pages. help.macros.browseMacros.title=Browse Macros help.macros.chart={0}Chart Macro{1} displays graphical charts generated from miscellaneous data sources. help.macros.chart.description=Generates graphical charts from data sources. help.macros.chart.title=Chart help.macros.description=Macros are reusable functionality that can be integrated inside a page. help.macros.errorMacro=Error Macro help.macros.examples.description=Need help or confused with some of our macros? Check out their documentation and find out more about their functionality. help.macros.example=Example help.macros.examples.title=Examples help.macros.gallery={0}Gallery Macro{1} displays a list of images in a slide-show gallery. help.macros.gallery.description=Displays a list of images in a slide-show gallery. help.macros.gallery.title=Gallery help.macros.infoMacro=Info Macro help.macros.thisIsAnInfoMacro=This is an info message help.macros.notifications.content={0}Notifications Macro{0} provides information about recent activities done by the users. help.macros.notifications.currentUserActivity=Current User Activity help.macros.notifications.description=Displays recent activities done on pages by the users. help.macros.notifications.title=Notifications help.macros.notifications.wikiActivity=Wiki Activity help.macros.pageTree.description=Displays the hierarchy of pages. help.macros.pageTree.title=Page Tree help.macros.pieChart=Pie Chart help.macros.section=Section help.macros.subSection=Sub-Section help.macros.successMacro=Success Macro help.macros.tableOfContents={0}Table of Contents Macro{0} generates a table of contents for the page headings. help.macros.tableOfContents.description=Generates a table of contents for the page headings. help.macros.tableOfContents.title=Table of Contents help.macros.thisIsABoxMessage=This is a box message help.macros.thisIsAnInformativeMessage=This is an informative message help.macros.thisIsASuccessMessage=This is a success message help.macros.timeSeriesChart=Time Series Chart help.macros.title=Macros help.macros.titleOfTheBox=Title of the box help.macros.thereAreSeveralSpecialisedBoxMacros=There are several specialised box macros: help.macros.thisIsAnErrorMessage=This is an error message help.macros.thisIsAWarningMessage=This is a warning message help.macros.tree.compactPageHierarchyTree=Compact Page Hierarchy Tree help.macros.tree.description={0}Page Tree Macro{0} displays the hierarchy of pages. help.macros.tree.fullEntityTree=Full Entity Tree help.macros.tree.pageHierarchyTree=Page Hierarchy Tree help.macros.tree.title=Tree help.macros.tree.wikiSpace=Wiki {0} Space {0} Page Tree help.macros.useMacro.description=Macros are reusable pieces of functionality that can be integrated inside pages. help.macros.useMacro.tip=The {0} WYSIWYG Editor{1} allows you to insert macros and to customize their parameters when editing pages. Look for the {2} button on the tool bar. help.macros.useMacro.title=Use Macros help.macros.viewMoreMacros=View more macros help.macros.warningMacro=Warning Macro help.mainXwikiFeatures.description=Congratulations for acquiring your XWiki instance. XWiki is very versatile and can be used to create knowledge bases, intranets or any type of business application you want. This is achievable because of XWiki's customization power, that starts at page level, from a simple to a more advanced usage. help.mainXwikiFeatures.title=Main XWiki features help.pageEditing.description=Use a powerful {0}WYSIWYG{1} content editor or {2}syntax{3} to create rich wiki pages. help.pageEditing.title=Page Editing help.seeExamples.label=See examples help.templates.article.description=Article page help.templates.article.myNewArticle=My new article help.templates.article.title=Article help.templates.contents=Contents help.templates.references=References help.templates.paragraph=Paragraph help.templates.simple=Simple help.templates.subParagraph=Sub-paragraph help.templates.subSubParagraph=Sub-sub paragraph help.templates.createYourTemplate.description=Integrate structure and macros in an existing page, and transform it in a template. help.templates.createYourTemplate.tip={0}Template Providers{1} expose templates on the Create Page dialog so that the users can use them. help.templates.createYourTemplate.title=Create your template help.templates.description=Templates are predefined pages that are copied when creating a new page. help.templates.encyclopedia.credits=Credits help.templates.encyclopedia.description=Encyclopedia page help.templates.encyclopedia.falabella=Falabella help.templates.encyclopedia.image=Image help.templates.encyclopedia.miniatureHorse=Miniature horse help.templates.encyclopedia.morphology=Morphology help.templates.encyclopedia.price=Price help.templates.encyclopedia.region=Region help.templates.encyclopedia.title=Encyclopedia help.templates.examples.description=Want to start from a predefined template? Here are some examples of available templates inside XWiki help.templates.examples.title=Examples help.templates.figure=Figure help.templates.meeting.actionItems=Action Items help.templates.meeting.agenda=Agenda help.templates.meeting.attendees=Attendees help.templates.meeting.conferenceRoom=CONFERENCE ROOM help.templates.meeting.date=04 SEPTEMBER 20XX help.templates.meeting.hour=10:00 AM help.templates.meeting.lastMeetingFollowUp=Last Meeting Follow-up help.templates.meeting.newBusiness=New Business help.templates.meeting.nextMeetingAgenda=Next Meeting Agenda help.templates.meeting.notes=Notes help.templates.meeting.summary=Summary help.templates.meeting.teamMeeting=Team Meeting help.templates.meetingReport.description=Agenda and notes help.templates.meetingReport.title=Meeting Report help.templates.sea=Sea help.templates.simplePage.description=With table of contents help.templates.simplePage.title=Simple Page help.templates.title=Templates help.templates.useTemplates.description=Templates are predefined pages that can be copied when creating a new page. help.templates.useTemplates.tip={0}Creating pages{1} based on templates makes it faster to adapt predefined content to your needs. help.templates.useTemplates.title=Use templates help.templates.viewMoreTemplates=View more templates help.templates.waves=Waves help.title=Help help.tryIt.label=Try it! help.versionControl.description=View previous versions of a page, compare different versions or rollback to any past version. help.versionControl.title=Version Control help.videos.addRemoveExtensions.title=Add / Remove Extensions help.videos.addRemoveExtensions.topic1=Discover how to add/remove extensions using the Extension Manager help.videos.addRemoveExtensions.topic2=Discover the XWiki Administration UI help.videos.appWithinMinutes.title=App Within Minutes help.videos.appWithinMinutes.topic1=Discover how to create an application help.videos.appWithinMinutes.topic2=Learn how to use your application help.videos.description=View our collection of video tutorials. help.videos.homepageCustomization.title=Homepage Customization help.videos.homepageCustomization.topic1=Learn how to change your wiki color theme help.videos.homepageCustomization.topic2=Learn how to add panels and columns to your wiki look help.videos.homepageCustomization.topic3=Learn how to add widgets to a wiki help.videos.homepageOverview.title=Homepage Overview help.videos.homepageOverview.topic1=Discover the elements displayed on your homepage help.videos.homepageOverview.topic2=Start browsing your wiki help.videos.importingOfficeDocumentsToXWiki.title=Importing Office Documents to XWiki help.videos.importingOfficeDocumentsToXWiki.topic1=Discover how to import Office Documents to your wiki help.videos.importingOfficeDocumentsToXWiki.topic2=Learn how to use a "Table of content" macro' help.videos.pageAndContentCreation.title=Page and Content Creation help.videos.pageAndContentCreation.topic1=Discover how to create a page help.videos.pageAndContentCreation.topic2=Learn how to use the WYSIWYG editor help.videos.pageAndContentCreation.topic3=Discover the view and edit modes help.videos.title=Videos help.videos.viewMoreVideos=View more videos help.videos.watch=Watch
